edge: Shah Rukh Khan's character, Major Ram Prasad Sharma, is introduced as Shekhar's son.
Suniel Shetty plays Ex-Major Raghavan Dutta, a former army officer turned terrorist.
Sushmita Sen portrays Chandini Chopra, the chemistry teacher and love interest of Shah Rukh Khan's character.
Amrita Rao plays Sanjana Bakshi, the daughter of General Amarjeet Bakshi and love interest of Zayed Khan's character.
Zayed Khan appears as Laxman Prasad Sharma, Ram's half-brother and Sanjuâ€™s love interest.
In the movie, Boman Irani plays Yogendra Agarwal, the college principal.
Kirron Kher portrays Madhu Sharma, Ram's stepmother and Lucky's mother.
Bindu essays the character of Mrs. Sonali Kakkar in the movie.
Murali Sharma appears as Ex-Captain Khan, Raghavan's second-in-command.
In the movie, Kunal Kumar portrays Baman Shastri, Ram's friend.
Kabir Bedi essays the character of General Amarjeet Bakshi, Sanju's father and Ram's superior officer.
In a special appearance, Naseeruddin Shah plays Brig. Shekhar Prasad Sharma, Ram and Lucky's father.
Satish Shah portrays Professor Madhav Rasai in the movie.
Rakhi Sawant appears as Mini in the movie.
In the movie, Praveen Sirohi plays Vivek.
In the movie, Rajiv Panjabi appears as Percy.
Geeta Kapoor made a cameo appearance in the song 'Gori Gori' as a girl dancing.
Geeta Kapoor appeared as a dancer in the song 'Gori Gori'.
Sajid Khan made a guest appearance as one of the band members in the song 'Gori Gori'.
Rajeev Khandelwal made a cameo appearance in the movie as himself.
